mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT t.* FROM train t FORCE INDEX (index_startTime),eosorg_t_organization org WHERE (t.orgId=org.orgID OR t.orgId=org.attachedOrgId OR t.sponsorId=org.orgID)
AND t.year=#{year}
AND t.trainName like CONCAT('%',#{trainName},'%')
AND t.keyWordsTag like CONCAT('%',#{keyWordsTag},'%')
AND t.trainTypeID=#{trainTypeID}
AND ((t.orgId= #{orgId} OR t.sponsorId=#{orgId}) OR (t.organizerId = #{operatorId} OR t.operatorId = #{operatorId} ))
AND t.ID>-1 ORDER BY t.startTime DESC
SELECT from train WHERE trainID=#{trainID} and tenantId=#{tenantId}

select train.id as trainId , train.trainName, train.trainTypeId, train.startTime, train.endTime, train.sponsorName, train.orgname as orgName , train.organizerName, train.telephone,train.organizerEmail,train.classHour,train.attendantCount, train.ifBJ, train.location, train.isEnrolled, train.programStartTime, train.programEndTime, train.item_type as itemType , train.tenantId ,train.implStatusId, train.reported ,train.approveStatus, train.imgUrl from train WHERE train.pubstatus=1092
AND train.trainName like CONCAT('%',#{trainName},'%')
and train.openOrgSEQ in
#{item}
order by train.startTime desc
